A whale withdrew 520B $PEPE($5.28M) from #Binance 30 minutes ago.

It is worth noting that this whale is not smart.

He bought a total of 10 tokens and never sold them. 

According to the current price, he lost a total of $6.1M, 5 tokens were profitable, and the win rate is 50%.

Not everyone made money on $GME.

These 3 guys lost tens of thousands of dollars by buying $GME with #FOMO and panic selling after the price dropped!

Remember, please don't buy with #FOMO when prices are skyrocketing, and don’t panic sell when prices are falling!

My follower 
@ShitGemHunter
 told me that the 95.78M $GME he sold for $136K was worth over $2M at its peak!

He made common mistakes that many traders made and also lost money on multiple coins such as $ANALOS, $BOMO, and more.

1/ 
Let’s dig into his trades for lessons.

6/ Lessons:

- Sell in batches, don't sell them all at once to avoid selling too early.

- Don't trade frequently.

- Don't buy blindly due to market #FOMO.

- If you miss a gem token, don't worry, be patient and look for the next gem.

7/
